items.metataghtml: <meta name="description" content="Beautify™’s Ultra Hold is the best tape choice for heavier or thicker wefts.">
items.storedetaileddescription:
Beautify™’s Ultra Hold is the best tape choice for heavier or thicker wefts. Made with a strong initial tack, Ultra Hold grabs on quickly to maximize the strength it provides. It is also built to give a very comfortable wear, giving users a secure and pleasant wear experience.

All Beautify™ tapes will last 4-6 weeks depending on installation and care. Actual performance varies on body chemistry, climate, etc.

Keep the product away from heat, humidity, and light. Store in a well-ventilated, cool, dark, dry, room-temperature controlled environment (60-80°F). Seal bags completely.

With proper storage, our tapes have a shelf life of up to one year.
items.outofstockbehavior: Allow back orders with no out-of-stock message
items.displayname: Beautify - Ultra Hold Tape - 1/3" X 6 Yds, Roll
items.storedisplayname2: Beautify - Ultra Hold Tape - 1/3" X 6 Yds, Roll
items.storedescription:
Rolls:

Peel the Ultra Hold tape from the roll and cut to desired length. Avoid touching the adhesive.
Place the cut piece of Ultra Hold onto the extension weft.
Repeat as needed.
When you are ready to apply the extensions, peel off the liner and install it to the hair.
items.pagetitle: Beautify - Ultra Hold Tape - 1/3" X 6 Yds, Roll | Walker Tape
